title: Rick and Morty
desc: This project consists of the development of an api to search and filter the characters of the Rick and Morty series using React.js

title: Netflis
desc: Netflis is a series searcher, which allows you to manage your own list of favorite series. Javascript was used to make it.

title: Awesome profile cards
desc: I worked on this project in a group. We inherited the code in Javascript and we rewrote it in React.js. We also made the connection with a Heroku server using Node.js.
